trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define 3D geometric shapes.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra denne abstrakt basisklasse Definer 3D-geometrisk former.

trans-unit.source: The Geometry3D class of objects can be used for hit-testing and rendering 3D graphic data.
trans-unit.target: Klassen Geometry3D som kan brukes for testing av treff og 3D grafisk data gjengis.

trans-unit.source: A Geometry3D by itself has no appearance.
trans-unit.target: En Geometry3D alene har ingen utseende.

trans-unit.source: To render a Geometry3D, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D> to combine the Geometry3D with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere en Geometry3D, kan du bruke en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>å kombinere Geometry3D med <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D> is the concrete instance of a Geometry3D.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>er konkrete forekomst av en Geometry3D.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>

trans-unit.source: To render a 3D shape, compose a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D> by specifying a MeshGeometry3D and a Material.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere en 3D-form, skrive en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>ved å angi en MeshGeometry3D og et materiale.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> that specifies the axis-aligned bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"> </xref> som angir akse justert avgrensende boksen for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Bounding <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bounding <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
